pages.title: Overview
pages.text: It includes a comprehensive collection of prebuilt components that are ready for use in production right out of the box, and features a suite of customization options.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: Since DS library components are built to function in isolation, they don't require any kind of globally scoped styles.

pages.title: Alert
pages.text: Alerts display brief messages for the user

pages.title: Badge
pages.text: Badge generates a small badge to the top-right of its child(ren)

pages.title: Breadcrumbs
pages.text: A breadcrumbs is a list of links that help visualize a page's location

pages.title: Button
pages.text: Buttons allow users to take actions, and make choices, with a single tap

pages.title: Progress
pages.text: Progress used to indicate the current advancement state of a process

pages.title: Modal
pages.text: The modal component provides a solid foundation for creating dialogs

pages.title: Select
pages.text: The Selectcomponent provides a compact way to present a list of choices to the user.

pages.title: Stepper
pages.text: Steppers convey progress through numbered steps. It provides a wizard-like workflow

pages.title: Switch
pages.text: Switches toggle the state of a single setting on or off

pages.title: TextField
pages.text: TextFields let users enter and edit text

pages.title: TextArea
pages.text: TextArea is a resizable input used to prompt the user for a parapraph of text
